summary: Necromancers have skeletons to fight for them. With this mod, you can also have one skeleton fight for you. Keep it as a distraction and let him do the ”dirty” job and level your conjuration skill.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#b6b6b6]Greetings, fellow Skyrim lovers![/color] [color=#b6b6b6]
[/color]
[/size][size=3]I have made this mod to give you the possibility to conjure skeletons to fight for you. This mod is ideal for low-level characters, but not only.

[/size][color=#ffff00][size=4][b]Why?[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]I thought it was unfair that only necromancers were able to have skeletons to aid them in battle. If you want your character to be a conjurer or even a necromancer this mod will certainly prove useful to you, as well as the next mods from the Summon Undead series, which I will fully release this month (hopefully).[/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]Where do I find the spell tome?

[/b][/size][/color][size=3]You can find the spell tome either at the [u][color=#00ff00]Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood[/color][/u] in the second room on the left on the small table or at merchants. The spell tome at the Sleeping Giant Inn can be taken for free.
[/size][size=4]At merchants:
[color=#f9cb9c]Farengar - Whiterun (Dragonsreach)
Falion - Morthal (Falion's House)
Sybille Stentor - Solitude (Blue Palace)
Madena - Dawnstar (White Hall)
Wylandriah - Riften (Mistveil Keep)
Phinis Gestor - Winterhold (College Of Winterhold)
Lucan Valerius - Riverwood (Riverwood Trader)
Calcelmo - Markarth (Understone Keep)
[/color][/size]
[size=4][color=#ffff00]Are there any problems with this mod I should think about?[/color]

[/size][size=3]As far as I know, you shouldn't have any problems with it. If you find any problems leave me a message or a comment on this mod. [/size]

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]How do I download this with the Nmm (Nexus Mod Manager)?[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]Just click on the Manual Installation button. It will redirect you to the file page, where you can download it with the manager. [/size]


[color=#ff0000][size=5]Also check out:[/size][/color]
[size=4][u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61247/?]Daughters Of Dibella[/url][/u][/size]
[size=4][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60677/?]Younger looking[/url][/u][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60677/?] Sorex Vinius[/url][/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61222/?][u]Farkas and Vilkas Redon[/u][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61222/?][u]e[/u][/url]
[/size][u][size=4][color=#b6b6b6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61424/?]Summon undead - Conjure Restless Draug[/url][/color][color=#b6b6b6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61424/?]r[/url] [/color][/size][/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60433/?][u][size=4]Beautiful Onmund
[/size][/u]

[/url][size=5][color=#d5a6bd]Enjoy! ☺[/color]
[/size]

[i][size=3]jodidovahkiin[/size][/i]
author: jodidovahkiin

files.name: Summon Skeleton - Buyable spell tomes
files.changelogHtml: buyable spell tomes from merchants (see description)
